DOC.brief_title: Promoting Health Self Experience ( PHASE ) Randomized Controlled Trial
DOC.detailed_description: Objective : To evaluate effectiveness personal experience personal initiation program health prevention activity health provider follow impact patient compare control ( no-intervention ) group . Methods : A randomized control trial Randomization : Health provider discipline recruit 10 clinic Clalit Health Services , Dan district randomize use cluster ( clinic ) randomization , intervention control group . In clinic 15 health care provider 50 patient interview provide total 150 health care provider 500 patient . Intervention : The intervention deliver psychologist social worker train group facilitation experimental learning . The program base theory experimental learning Bridges model change . In intervention clinic 5 workshop initiation health prevention project clinic organize intervention team clinic follow intervention team 6 month . No intervention provide control clinic . Outcomes : change quality measurement intervention non-intervention clinic . Among health provider change attitude , personal view life style well health prevention activity assess questionnaire . A random sample 50 patient age 21-50 participate clinic select interview use questionnaire . The questionnaire include question regard administration screening test , treatment abnormal measurement , life style change satisfaction performance clinic health care provider . The evaluation health care provider patient perform baseline 6 month .
